item.title: The Academy of Pathology celebrated the anniversary of its Post Graduate Teaching in Pathology at RRMCH on 18 November 2012

Continue reading "The Academy of Pathology celebrated the anniversary of its Post Graduate Teaching in Pathology at RRMCH on 18 November 2012"
item.content:encoded:
The Academy of Pathology, as a part of its Fourth “Continuing Medical Education Programme”, celebrated the anniversary of its ‘Post Graduate Teaching in Pathology’ at RajaRajeswari Medical College and Hospital auditorium on 18th November 2012.

Many Medical fraternity luminaries from different parts of India  took part in the event which attracted a big turnaround of students as well. The topics discussed in the event like ‘The Past, Present and Future of Pathology’ and ‘Cytology Slideshow’ were very inspiring and highly relevant for our times.

The event witnessed the detailed discussions on ‘Interesting cases in Histopathology’ which attracted a huge audience. At the conclusion of the event, an interactive session on ‘Group Dynamics – on Liver Pathology’ was conducted.
